content.question: The image most directly illustrates which of the following features of the political development of medieval Europe?

choices.label: Its bureaucratization, as European rulers developed sophisticated systems of record keeping to strengthen their authority.
Its decentralization, as European rulers frequently delegated authority to local subordinates.
Its reliance on Roman traditions, as European rulers used ancient customs to demonstrate their legitimacy.
Its ethnic and cultural diversity, as European rulers granted ethnic and religious groups the right to use their own laws and traditions.

content.answer: Its decentralization, as European rulers frequently delegated authority to local subordinates.

topic.text: 1.6: Developments in Europe from c. 1200 to c. 1450
